text: Digos is a city and capital of the province of Davao del Sur, Philippines. The city lies on the western shores of the Davao Gulf and southern foothills of Mount Apo on the island of Mindanao. It became a city in 2000.NSCB - 2001 Factsheet - 12 New Cities Created , Julyâ€“December 2000. ==References== Category:Cities in the Philippines Category:Provincial capitals of the Philippines Category:Davao del Sur
title: Digos
